example.text: Congressman Byron Donalds critical of FEMA taking trailers away in August [[url]]

"More than two months since Hurricane Ian made landfall, far too many communities in my district are still reeling and require additional recovery assistance. I am proud to lead this bipartisan letter supporting Governor DeSantis' request for FEMA's 100 percent cost share for communities hardest hit by this deadly storm."

My bill is a commonsense proposal with bicameral support, a strong roster of cosponsors & is a tangible solution to this dire problem plaguing SWFL. I'm proud to be your advocate & will continue to fight hard on your behalf to ensure we're ALL treated fairly by the federal gov. [[url]]

The shameless audacity of the [[user]] to lay blame on Congress for the ongoing immigration crisis is jarring &, quite frankly, a joke. The American people know who's to blame for the open border: Joe Biden & his party. Do not listen to a word [[user]] says. It's all lies. [[url]]
Congressman Byron Donalds critical of FEMA taking trailers away in August [[url]]
?EXCLUSIVE? Energy security is national security, and we MUST ensure that the United States of America adapts to a position of self-sufficiency. [[url]]

My bill is a commonsense proposal with bicameral support, a strong roster of cosponsors & is a tangible solution to this dire problem plaguing SWFL. I'm proud to be your advocate & will continue to fight hard on your behalf to ensure we're ALL treated fairly by the federal gov. [[url]]
